_sText:
There are 14 stages, each stage has a unique unusual mechanic. Most of the mechanics were used or can be used in a wr run. Quite challenging map if you dont know how the source engine and bhop mechanics work. You might need showtriggers for the first time playing.
There is also the _sr version which doesn't have playerclips after teleports. For the first playthrough, I recommend playing the regular version.

If you are gonna play it in momentum mod you need to launch in mapping mode and disable some fixes with these commands:Â 

mom_mv_fix_duck_collision 0;mom_mv_fix_nojump_slope_boosts 0;mom_mv_fix_edges 0;mom_mv_normalize_jump_height 0;mom_mv_snap_to_ground 0
